```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Load results from the analysis
source("scripts/first_chart.R")

# Loading libraries
library("knitr")
library("ggplot2")
library("plotly")
library("kableExtra")
library("maps")
library("leaflet")
```

```{r only_us_airports, echo = FALSE}
us_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()
us_map %>% addCircleMarkers(
  lat = only_us_aiports$latitude_deg,
  lng = only_us_aiports$longitude_deg
  popup = paste("Name:", only_us_aiports$name, "<br>",
                "Type:", only_us_aiports$type, "<br>",
                "Elevation:", only_us_aiports$elevation_ft)
)

```
